page.title: 17Arts/Crafts.HamstallRidware
page.content: The Centre is at Hamstall Ridware. The Manor-Domesday entry 1086. One week's events-Ridware Arts Centre. Sunday June 2nd.1985.Exhibition of batik scarves by Sue Tuckett. Ludlow History Group for tea.Monday June 3rd Centre closed.Jen and Di went into Shropshire to buy plants for gardens. Tuesday June 4th.Preparation for Midlands Potters'Exhibition.Busy painting in the Great Barn.Wednesday June 5th.Planting hanging baskets.Visit Lichfield to discuss V.A.T.return. Thursday June 6th.Paul Gooderham brings porcelain pieces for craft shop.Frank brought hand blown glass from Lichfield Coloured etchings ordered.Historic Buildings Commission considering grant for us.Friday June 7th.Guided tour of centre.Advertise for blacksmith-forge. Saturday June 8th.Village Garden Fete opened by Lord and Lady Leigh.
